author: Amazon Customer

review: I already own a Roku 3 and a chromecast but purchased two of these as gifts because I love Amazon products.  I think there will come a day when Amzon surpasses Apple in technology.The interface on the Fire TV stick is very user friendly and looks great.  If my parents can figure out how to use it.....you can too!!  ;)I am seriously beginning to wonder if I need cable anymore.  The Fire stick enables you to stream so much content.  It is just as fast as my double the price ROKU 3 and the app/channel store is robust.  You can also play games on it. Please do yourself a favor if you are trying to choose between this and chromecast hands down the fire stick is the way to go.  You can't do much with chromecast and are limited to mirroring a handful of apps from your phone, not to mention that it does not come with a remote nor can you play games.  I'm very excited to see what Amazon has in store, because already they are knocking it out of the park.

review: Works great as long as your wi-fi is adequate. Once I boosted my wi-fi with a wi-fi extender, the Fire Stick works beautifully. Installing the batteries was a bit of a challenge. You have to press on the stick extremely hard to open the battery compartment.
author: Fred V. Amundsen

review: When I first received the Fire TV Stick, my TV was not able to read find the device. Trying another TV, the Fire TV Stick was detected, but could not find the remote.  Before I gave up, I returned that unit and exchanged it for a new one.  I'm happy to say that I think the first unit I got was defective. The second one I received worked perfectly.  Setup was easy and I was happy to see how responsive the interface was.
